description: A comprehensive set of extensions methods to complement Cuemon .NET Framework.
releaseNotes:
This release contains some bug fixes as well as a few revised extension methods.
The following work was completed for this release:

- New extensions for String: IsNullOrEmpty, SanitizeElementText, SanitizeElementText, IsEmailAddress, IsGuid, IsHex
- New extensions for IEnumerable{TSource}: Contains
- New extensions for IEnumerable{string}: IsSequenceOf{T}
- New extensions for IDataReader: ToEnumerable
- New extensions for SortOrder: ToOrderByClause

- Refactored the WebSecurityUtilityExtension class in the Cuemon.Security namespace to support the new SecurityTokenSettings class

- Removed the SanitizeXmlCharacterData for String
- The DataTransferRowPagedCollection class in the Cuemon.Data namespace was deprecated hereby removing all DataTransferRowPagedCollection extensions
summary: A free and flexible assembly package, built to extend and boost your codebelt - providing vast ways of possibilities for all breeds of coders, programmers, developers and the likes thereof.
title: Cuemon .NET Framework Extensions
